quizDescription.text: The following figure shows three data points and the best fit line y = 3x + 2. The x-coordinate, or "x", is our independent variable and the y-coordinate, or "y", is our dependent variable.

questionText.text: Which of these terms best describes the type of AI used in today’s email spam filters, speech recognition, and other specific applications?

options.option: Artificial Narrow Intelligence (ANI)
Artificial General Intelligence (AGI)

questionText.text: What do you call the commonly used AI technology for learning input (A) to output (B) mappings?

options.option: Supervised learning
Unsupervised learning
Reinforcement learning
Artificial General Intelligence

questionText.text: You want to use supervised learning to build a speech recognition system. The figure below suggests that in order for a neural network (deep learning) to achieve the best performance, you would ideally use: (Select all that apply)

options.option: A large dataset (of audio files and the corresponding text transcript)
A small dataset (of audio files and the corresponding text transcript)
A large neural network
A small neural network

questionText.text: The only way to acquire data for a supervised learning algorithm is to manually label it. I.e., given the input A, to ask a human to provide B.

options.option: True
False

questionText.text: Which of these statements regarding data acquisition do you agree with?

options.option: It doesn’t help to give data to an AI team, because they can always produce whatever they need by themselves.
Only structured data is valuable; AI cannot process unstructured data.
Some types of data are more valuable than others; working with an AI team can help you figure out what data to acquire.
It doesn’t matter how data is acquired. The more data, the better.

questionText.text: You run a company that manufactures scooters. Which of the following are examples of unstructured data? (Select all that apply.)

options.option: Audio files of the engine sound of your scooters
Pictures of your scooters
The maximum speed of each of your scooters
The number of scooters sold per week over the past year

questionText.text: Suppose you run a website that sells cat food. Which of these might be a good result from a Data Science project? (Select all that apply.)

options.option: A slide deck presenting a plan on how to modify pricing in order to improve sales.
A neural network that closely mimics how cats’ brains work.
A large dataset of images labeled as "Cat" and "Not Cat"
Insights into how to market cat food more effectively, depending on the breed of cat.

questionText.text: Based on the terminology defined in Video 4, which of the following statements do you agree with? (Select all that apply.)

options.option: The terms “Deep learning” and “neural network” are used almost interchangeably.
Deep learning is a type of machine learning.  (I.e., all deep learning algorithms are machine learning algorithms.)
AI is a type of deep learning. (I.e., all AI algorithms are deep learning algorithms.)
The terms “Machine learning” and “data science” are used almost interchangeably.

questionText.text: What of these do AI companies do well?

options.option: Strategic data acquisition
Invest in unified data warehouses
Spot automation opportunities
All of the above

questionText.text: Say you want to input a picture of a person’s face (A), and output whether or not they are smiling (B). Because this is a task that most humans can do in less than 1 second, supervised learning can probably learn this A-to-B mapping.

options.option: True
False
